title: Understanding Inclusion
text: Inclusion involves creating an environment where everyone feels valued and respected, regardless of their cultural background.

title: Key Aspects of Inclusion
text: Consider how inclusion is about acknowledging and respecting diverse cultures within a community.

hintAnswer: nurturing a community that acknowledges, respects, and has regard for people from all different cultures
title: Defining Inclusion
text: Which of the following best describes inclusion?
choices: a variety of communities that are very different from one another
nurturing a community that acknowledges, respects, and has regard for people from all different cultures
Respecting and learning about the cultures of others while exploring one’s own cultural biases
personal awareness of one’s own limited knowledge of the client’s culture
